internal.content:
--- title: Jeyoon Park description: Interview for Jeyoon Park --- Jeyoon Park 박제윤 **Q: Name, year, major, UKA department/ position**
A: Jeyoon Park, 2nd year Biology, Operations Committee Director
**Q: 이름, 학년, 전공, 유카 부서**
A: 박제윤, 2학년 biology, 운영부
**Q: What is your favorite ice cream flavor?**
A: Mint chocolate
**Q: 가장 좋아하는 베라 (아이스크림) 맛은?**
A: 민트 초코
**Q: When you were a child, what did you want to be when you grow up?**
A: Movie director
**Q: 어렸을 때, 커서 무엇이 되고 싶었는지?**
A: 영화 감독님
**Q: If you were directing a movie, what genre would it be?**
A: Uh… probably just a movie about everyday, daily life. There’s not much plot, not a specific story, but you just show the little things.
**Q: 만약 영화를 연출한다면 어떤 장르의 영화일지?**
A: 어… 그냥 일상생활 영화. 정확한 구성이나 스토리는 없지만 소소하게 작은 일상적인 영화.
**Q: How would you describe the color this color (teal) to someone who has never seen it before?**
![teal](../teal.png) A: The color of rain falling at dawn?
**Q: 시각 장애인에게 ‘청록색’을 어떻게 설명할 것인지?**
A: 새벽에 비가 온 색깔?
**Q: If you were to become the president of UKA, what would be the first thing you would do?**
A: I would just do what they’ve been doing haha. I’m not sure if I could do better than how it’s being done.
**Q: 만약 내가 유카의 1인자가 된다면 가장 먼저 할 것은?**
A: 그냥 지금 하던 것 계속 할 것 같은데 ㅎㅎ 지금 보다 더 잘 할 수 있는지 모르겠어요.

MdxNode.rawBody:
